name: Rave Reports Project File
summary: Learn about .RAV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: RAV reports can be filled with data from external data sources or from data stored directly within an enclosing application.
NOTE: Rave Reports is available as a standalone product or as an add-on for Borland Delphi and C++ Builder IDEs.

description: Project file created by Rave Reports, a report designing application; saves the page layout, graphics, text, and fillable fields for one or more reports; can be deployed within a built application so that reports are served to the user within the program's user interface; can also be hosted by a Rave Reports Server that provides reports on demand.
